1.0.name: wordpress/reddle
1.0.description: Everything about Reddle's minimal design elegantly adapts to how you want to use your blog and what you want to use it for. Want to use your blog for a simple one-column link blog? A two-column business site with a custom header and no posts? Reddle can do that too — and look good doing it too.
